{{velocity}} #macro(ensureBookNavigationPanel) ## Get XWikiPreferences document #set ($prefsDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.XWikiPreferences'))
## Get the panels preferences object #set ($prefsObj = $prefsDoc.getObject('XWiki.XWikiPreferences'))
## Get current panel lists #set ($leftPanels = $prefsObj.getProperty('leftPanels').value) #set ($rightPanels = $prefsObj.getProperty('rightPanels').value)
## The panel we want to place #set ($bookNavPanel = 'BookVersions.Code.BookNavigation')
## Check if panel already exists in either configuration #set ($isInLeft = $leftPanels.contains($bookNavPanel)) #set ($isInRight = $rightPanels.contains($bookNavPanel))
## Only proceed if panel isn't already placed somewhere #if (!$isInLeft && !$isInRight) ## Prefer left if available #if ("$!leftPanels" != '') #if ($leftPanels.endsWith(',')) #set ($newPanels = "${leftPanels}${bookNavPanel}") #else #set ($newPanels = "${leftPanels},${bookNavPanel}") #end $prefsObj.set('leftPanels', $newPanels) $prefsDoc.save('Added BookNavigation panel to left panels') #elseif ("$!rightPanels" != '') #if ($rightPanels.endsWith(',')) #set ($newPanels = "${rightPanels}${bookNavPanel}") #else #set ($newPanels = "${rightPanels},${bookNavPanel}") #end $prefsObj.set('rightPanels', $newPanels) $prefsDoc.save('Added BookNavigation panel to right panels') #end #end #end {{/velocity}}
